tips: The mana loss reduction does not only work for mana cost of spells, it affects any form of mana loss not caused by losing intelligence.
attrs: Bonus +16 Strength +16 Intelligence +30% Health regen amplification +30% Lifesteal amplification +12% Spell damage +20% Status resistance +16% Mana loss reduction
info: For strength heroes, it grants 320 health, 1.6 health regen, 1.28% magic resistance, 192 mana, 0.8 mana regen, 13.12% spell damage and 16 attack damage.
For agility heroes, it grants 320 health, 1.6 health regen, 1.28% magic resistance, 192 mana, 0.8 mana regen and 13.12% spell damage.
For intelligence heroes, it grants 320 health, 1.6 health regen, 1.28% magic resistance, 192 mana, 0.8 mana regen, 13.12% spell damage and 16 attack damage.
Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of status resistance.
The health regen amplification stacks additively with other sources of health regen amplification.
The lifesteal amplification stacks additively with other sources of lifesteal amplification.
Mana loss reduction and spell damage amplification from multiple Kaya-based items ( Kaya, Kaya and Sange, Yasha and Kaya, Bloodstone, Trident) do not stack.
Stacks additively with other sources of mana loss reduction.
